events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision on April 30th involving their car and another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and keywords related to a car collision.
An agent with expertise in auto accident claims was assigned to handle the case and guide the customer through the process.
The insurance provider acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured the customer that the investigation will begin promptly.
The customer was requested to submit photos of the damaged vehicle and the police accident report to support their claim.
The customer provided all requested documents including police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and repair estimates.
An investigation was initiated to verify the details of the collision and evaluate the extent of damage to the vehicle.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the accident was caused by a third party, supporting the claim validity.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering all vehicle repair costs and additional transportation expenses.
The customer responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the prompt handling of their case.
The claim has been approved officially following agreement on settlement terms and documentation completion.
Payment covering all authorized vehicle repairs and incidental expenses was issued to the customer promptly.
The claim was closed after successful payment issuance and confirmation that the customerâ€™s vehicle has been repaired.
The claim file was archived safely in company records for future reference and regulatory compliance.
